subject: VDM
name: Comp Patho Conf
info: Discussions/demonstrations of contemporary aspects of diseases of animals. Emphasizes disease diagnosis, clinical outcomes, pathogenesis, and molecular mechanisms.

subject: VDM
name: Clin Path Conf
info: Topics involving cytology, hematology, clinical chemistry, and hemostasis. May be addressed from clinical path perspective.

subject: VDM
name: Labs
info: Hematology/cytology lab emphasizes microscopic aspects in dog, cat, cow, horse, sheep, goat, pig, and llama; case oriented approach to pathophysiologic aspects of disease. Diagnostic/clinical microbiology lab uses clinical diagnostic materials: students cultivate specimens, identify bacteria and fungi, and determine susceptibility; student presentations discuss cases and outline therapy/control.

subject: VDM
name: Hem-Cyt
info: Microscopic aspects of hematology/cytology in dog, cat, cow, horse, sheep, goat, pig, and llama. Case oriented approach is used to develop pathophysiologic aspects of disease. One week rotation.

subject: VDM
name: Directed Studies
fullname: Directed Studies in Veterinary Diagnostic Medicine
info: Special project under guidance of faculty member.

subject: VDM
name: Probs Diag Path
info: Laboratory techniques in diagnostic virology and serology by rotation through various laboratories in the Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory.  Opportunities for short term projects on viral research also exist.

subject: VDM
name: Sci. Writ & Spkg
info: Techniques of writing and publishing scientific papers and theses, including manuscript preparation, submission and review process, proofreading and publishing processes.  Critical review of published papers.  Oral and poster presentations at scientific meetings.

subject: VDM
name: Probs Diag Virology
info: Laboratory techniques in veterinary diagnostic pathology.

subject: VDM
name: Sem: Diagn. Med.
info: Presentation and discussion of morphologic and etiologic features of animal diseases.
